name: Ene
info:
She looks lazy and unmotivated when there's nothing to do, but becomes extremely excited and competitive in battle.
She's extremely proud of her robotic body, which is agile, powerful, and does not age. She's also stubborn and pushes herself to the limit, unwilling to go down before those with bodies made of flesh.
Mentally, however, she's still a child and reveals her fragile side when she's with her father.
description:
During the Old Federation era, the private military contractor Victoria had planned to develop a series of elite battle droids. Ene was the prototype produced by the program.
The initial design aim was to make the perfect droid: self-aware, independent, and able to think, feel and act just like a human. The executive who approved the program uploaded a backup of his deceased daughter's consciousness into Ene as her "soul."
Ene was later granted her rights as a human, as the daughter of the Victoria executive.
like: Being with her father, humans who are stronger than her
dislike: Fully comprehending the frailty of life

skills.name: Normal Attack
skills.description: While on the ground, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 76.3% of ATK plus 4 and knock the target back a short distance. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 62.1% of ATK plus 3 and knock the target back a short distance. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 157.4% of ATK plus 8 and knock the target back a short distance. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 263.8% of ATK plus 14 and launch the target. While Outburst is active, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row. First Attack: Deal damage equal to {8}% of ATK plus {9} and knock the target back a short distance. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to {10}% of ATK plus {11} and knock the target back a short distance. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to {12}% of ATK plus {13} and knock the target back a short distance. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to {14}% of ATK plus {15} and strongly suspend the target.

skills.name: Pummel
skills.description: While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to trigger Jumping Blast. Deal damage equal to 121.7% of ATK plus 6and suspend the target. While Outburst is active, deal damage equal to 133.9% of ATK plus 7 and strongly suspend the target. The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to 600% damage.

skills.name: Shockwave
skills.description: Tapping and holding while airborne, double-jumping, short tapping in the air when there are targets nearby, climbing, jumping backward, or attacking while using the Jetpack will trigger a Shockwave. Strongly suspend the target 4 times, dealing damage equal to 34.8% of ATK+ 2 each time. Cost 250 endurance. While Outburst is active, Shockwave strongly suspends the target 5 times, dealing damage equal to 38.3% of *ATK plus 2 each time. The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to 600% damage.

skills.name: Sneak Attack
skills.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to 427.5% of ATK plus 23.

skills.name: Focus Smash
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack to trigger Focus Smash (can be charged up to 3 stacks). Grant immunity to all control effects and hyperbody while charging. First Stack: Deal damage equal to 110% of ATK plus 6 and suspend the target. Second Stack: Deal damage equal to 276% of ATK plus 15 and strongly suspend the target. Third Stack: Deal damage equal to 518% of ATK plus 27 and strongly suspend the target. While Outburst is active, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Furious Strikes, dealing damage equal to 501.6% of ATK plus 26 and strongly suspend the target.

skills.name: Jumping Smash
skills.description: Use the arrow buttons and the dodge button to trigger Jumping Smash, unleashing a Shockwave that suspends the enemy 4 times, dealing damage equal to 161.6% of ATK plus 9.

skills.name: Worldsplitter
skills.description: Tap normal attack during the short period of time after a dodge to trigger Worldsplitter, unleashing 3 shockwaves forward, each dealing damage equal to 52.4% of ATK plus 3, and suspending the targets. While in Outburst mode, fire 5 shockwaves forward, each dealing damage equal to 52.4% of ATK plus 3 and suspending the target.

skills.name: Outburst
skills.description: Switch to activate Outburst, increasing damage dealt for 25 seconds. While Outburst is active, skills trigger Windfury, dealing damage equal to 219% of ATK plus 12, strongly suspending the target and creating an air current on the ground. While standing in the current, dodging has no cost. Cooldown: 45 seconds (Windfury's cooldown: 10 seconds).

skills.name: Overwhelming Maul
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the Wanderer and strongly suspend nearby targets, dealing damage equal to 153.3% of ATK plus 8. Also summon a maul to fall on nearby targets, dealing damage equal to 153.3% of ATK plus 8.

weapon_type.name: Ice Shell
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will strongly freeze targets for 2 seconds and leave them frostbitten for 6 seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to 111% of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by 50%.

advancement: Taunt nearby targets after switching to this weapon, preventing 1 instance of damage in the next 8 seconds and granting hyperbody for the next 8 seconds. Cooldown: 15 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 10%.
After taking damage, reduce all damage received by 50% for the next 6 seconds. Cooldown: 20 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 20%.
Normal attacks stun targets for 2.5 seconds. Cooldown: 20 seconds.
Discharge skills deal an additional 10% damage to targets and increase frost damage by an additional 10% for 25 seconds.

traits.name: Fast Mode
traits.description: When Ene swims, climbs, or glides, reduce endurance consumption by 12%.

traits.name: Beyond Limits Mode
traits.description: When Ene swims, climbs, or glides, reduce endurance consumption by 20%.
